abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32463543, pmid32462445, pmid32463454, pmid32463221, pmid32463093, pmid32462705, pmid32463794, pmid32462770, pmid32463288, pmid32463765, pmid32462701, pmid32463422, pmid32462929, pmid32463434, pmid32463348, pmid32462305, pmid32462970, pmid32463179, pmid32462354, pmid32462675, pmid32463289, pmid32463427, pmid32462756, pmid32463284, pmid32462282, pmid32463086, pmid32463088, pmid32462708, pmid32463341, pmid32462378, pmid32463545, pmid32463522, pmid32463092, pmid32463087, pmid32470174, pmid32462179, pmid32463530, pmid32462195, pmid32462783
